result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
This case called along with 14CF171, 14CF341 and 14CF348.  Defendant Richard G. Mundy in court with attorney William Andrew Mayer.  Yolanda J. Tienstra appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant's parents both appeared in the Courtroom.  State is Victims Right compliant.  Parties have a stipulation to resolve all cases. Ct. reviewed CPR and PQWOR and heard defendant's pleas as follows:  14CF171, Ct. 1- No Contest. 14CF341, Cts. 1, 3, 4 and 5-No Contest and 14CF348, Ct. 1-No Contest.     
In 14CF341, the Court found plea(s) given FKVI to Count 1, accepted plea(s), but does not find him guilty and places him on a DPA for 3 years. As to Counts 3, 4, and 5, the Court found Def. guilty of the in Am. Information.   Count 2 DRI. 
In 14CF348, the Court found plea given FKVI to Count 1, accepted plea and found him guilty. Counts 2 and 3 DRI. 
In 14CF171, the Court found plea given FKVI to Count 1, accepted plea and found him guilty.  Count 2 DRI. 
New pending case, 2015DD001393 (15CM294), Carrying a Concealed Weapon, is DRI today.  
Court found a factual basis and heard from State and Defense and sentenced him as follows:
14CF341, Defendant is placed on a DPA for three years with terms for Ct. 1-Burglary,  Count 2-DRI, on Counts 3&4, six months on EACH count, consecutive, comm. 9-18-15; Review Hrg. on 12-18-15.  As to Count 5-DC-Costs only. As to Counts 3, 4 & 5, SW-3 years of probation, restitution and costs.  
14CF171, SW, 3 years probation (concurrent with 14CF341), AODA assessment, treatment/followthru as recommended, and court costs. 
14CF348, SW, 3 years probation (concurrent with 14CF171 & 341), No contact with J.R.T., No VA contact with anyone, and Court costs.  May not request expungement for the misd. charges. 
Defendant is to see his treating psychiatrist/psychologist withint 2 weeks of 8-6-2015 and must take all prescribed medications as prescribed on time.  
No contact whatsoever with Riverview Park unless under the care/supervision of his mother.
